text: Boulogne-sur-Mer is a commune. It is in Nord-Pas-de-Calais in the Pas-de- Calais department in the north of France. Boulogne-sur-Mer set its record high temperature (35.4°C or 95.7°F) in July 2015. The record had been 34.8°C in Aug. 11, 2003.Heat Records Shattered in Germany, France, The Netherlands in June/July 2015 Europe Heat Wave July 8 2015 The Weather Channel ==References==
title: Boulogne-sur-Mer
